text: <@U10LM0FFZ> - have tried to deploy the car lease demo locally however the documentation seems to be a little off (suggesting changes to specific items on lines in files which don't exist) plus I get errors starting the peer on the VM... :disappointed:

<@U2CC1NDT2> there are also already some ‘legacy’ problems with the vehicles chaincode itself.
I was able to get it running locally - that took a while - but when I’m trying to create new assets, it fails due to some problems in the chaincode
I’m in the progress - somewhere between now and forever - of reshaping the chaincode itself
ahhh - ok - best not to waste time on this then for the moment...
depends how much time you’ve got to waste :wink:
if I get it working I’ll post it on my github
ok 100% - thanks for letting me know...
no problem, please do share if you’ve found - or build - a demo, complete with frontend
I’m doing multiple sales pitches to get some companies to invest, but when they see a working demo … well, wallets tend to open much quicker
